content:
HQ is looking for feedback on the dates for virtual May 2022 WGM, Connectathon, and DevDays. Note from HQ:

"Before adding dates to our calendar, we wish to run alternative dates by you in hopes of getting your buy-in. While there are three options listed below, HL7 staff recommends option A as it provides the greatest cushion between the FHIR Connectathon, WGM and DevDays.

Scenario A:

FHIR Connectathon: Monday May 2 – Thursday May 5, 2022
May WGM: Monday May 16 – Friday May 20
FHIR DevDays: Monday June 6 – Thursday June 9

Scenario B:

FHIR Connectathon: Monday May 9 – Thursday May 12
May WGM: Monday May 23 – Friday May 27
FHIR DevDays: Monday June 6 – Thursday June 9

Scenario C (no week-long break between WGM and connectathon events)

FHIR Connectathon: Monday May 16 – Thursday May 19
May WGM: Monday May 23 – Friday May 27
FHIR DevDays: Monday June 6 – Thursday June 9
We ran out of time on yesterday's call, so I'm posting here for feedback.
Hi all - just a reminder on this! I’ll be asked to report back to Mark about FMG’s opinion on Monday

Reposting - if no opinions, I will tell Mark that option A seems uncontested by FMG. He also just confirmed that the time zone for the WGM will be Eastern time.

HQ is looking for feedback on the dates for virtual May 2022 WGM, Connectathon, and DevDays. Note from HQ:

"Before adding dates to our calendar, we wish to run alternative dates by you in hopes of getting your buy-in. While there are three options listed below, HL7 staff recommends option A as it provides the greatest cushion between the FHIR Connectathon, WGM and DevDays.

Scenario A:

FHIR Connectathon: Monday May 2 – Thursday May 5, 2022
May WGM: Monday May 16 – Friday May 20
FHIR DevDays: Monday June 6 – Thursday June 9

Scenario B:

FHIR Connectathon: Monday May 9 – Thursday May 12
May WGM: Monday May 23 – Friday May 27
FHIR DevDays: Monday June 6 – Thursday June 9

Scenario C (no week-long break between WGM and connectathon events)

FHIR Connectathon: Monday May 16 – Thursday May 19
May WGM: Monday May 23 – Friday May 27
FHIR DevDays: Monday June 6 – Thursday June 9
I'm OK with any of them myself - A is fine...

Hello FMG: As you’ve heard, theJan F2F meeting in Henderson NV has been moved to Jan 2023. The Connectathon had been scheduled for Jan. 13-15 (stretching into the weekend before) to abut the F2F. But as virtual, should we move it up earlier in the week, beginning Jan 10 or 11, instead?
